reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: Protection of Syrian Refugee Women and other Vulnerable Women in Northern Iraq

description.narrative: The project will establish a women's community center (Women's Community Center WCC) in Dohuk Iraq. Of the Syrian refugess in Iraq 97% reside in the Kurdistan Region and 63% of these are women and children. The area has three refugee camps but most of the refugees live outside the camps. WCC will work for disadvantaged women in the security center which offers both psycho-social support and income support with the aim to prevent social and economic exclusion. The community's own resources will be used to en sure the sustainability of the project. The center will be open also to other vulnerable women in the area. Funding for the project is 777 609 Euros for a duration of 12 months.
